comment: First of all, they do deserved to be inducted. Millions records sold is no joke. With that said, Bon Jovi cant sing anymore. His voice is shot. Saw their performance and he cant sing for shit anymore. Time to hang it up..
amr:
# ::snt First of all, they do deserved to be inducted. Millions records sold is no joke. With that said, Bon Jovi cant sing anymore. His voice is shot. Saw their performance and he cant sing for shit anymore. Time to hang it up..
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (ii / induct-02
                  :ARG1 t)
            :mod (f / first-of-all))
      :snt2 (j / joke-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG2 (s / sell-01
                  :ARG1 (r / record
                        :quant (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 1000000))))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (s2 / sing-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Bon"
                                    :op2 "Jovi")
                              :part (v / voice))
                        :time (a2 / anymore)))
            :op2 (s3 / shoot-02
                  :ARG1 v)
            :snt4 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (s4 / see-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / perform-01
                              :ARG0 (t2 / they)))
                  :op2 (p4 / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (s5 / sing-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :purpose (s6 / shit))
                        :time (a4 / anymore)))
            :snt5 (t3 / time
                  :time-of (h / hang-01
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                        :mod (u / up)))))
